remarks: The finite hull of a product of groups is additionally closed under negation and thus is a subgroup of the product.  (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 11-Jan-2015.)
statement:
dsmmsubg.p $e |- P = ( S Xs_ R ) $.
dsmmsubg.h $e |- H = ( Base ` ( S (+)m R ) ) $.
dsmmsubg.i $e |- ( ph -> I e. W ) $.
dsmmsubg.s $e |- ( ph -> S e. V ) $.
dsmmsubg.r $e |- ( ph -> R : I --> Grp ) $.
dsmmsubg $p |- ( ph -> H e. ( SubGrp ` P ) ) $.
